price: (96) Repel, by [means of] what is best, [their] evil. We are most knowing of what they describe.
arabic: ٱدۡفَعۡ بِٱلَّتِي هِيَ أَحۡسَنُ ٱلسَّيِّئَةَۚ نَحۡنُ أَعۡلَمُ بِمَا يَصِفُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: id'faʿ bi-allatī hiya aḥsanu al-sayi-ata naḥnu aʿlamu bimā yaṣifūna
